author: FOSTER KLUG Associated Press
title: Countries facing pressure to loosen virus restrictions
description: South Korean officials are warning that hard-earned progress fighting the coronavirus pandemic could be upset by new infections at leisure spots
content:
TOKYO -- 
South Korean officials warned Monday that hard-earned progress fighting the coronavirus pandemic could be upset by new infections at bars and leisure spots, highlighting global tensions between governments desperate to maintain social distancing an… [+5522 chars]
